meanings.definition: Extremely unattractive or unpleasant in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The old, abandoned house on the corner is the unsightliest building in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: She wore the unsightliest dress to the party, but she didn't care because it was comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The unsightliest dog in the park somehow managed to steal everyone's attention with its funny antics.
meanings.sent4: The unsightliest part of the city was hidden away, like a dark secret waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unsightliest painting in the gallery seemed to follow you with its eerie gaze.

meanings.definition: The most unattractive or unpleasant in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Among all the sculptures in the museum, the unsightliest one stood out for its lack of detail.
meanings.sent2: The unsightliest of the flowers in the garden somehow managed to survive the harsh winter.
meanings.sent3: The unsightliest of the cakes at the bakery turned out to be the most delicious one.
meanings.sent4: In the lineup of cars, his old, rusty vehicle was the unsightliest, but it had the most character.
meanings.sent5: The unsightliest of the rocks on the beach held a hidden treasure underneath its rough surface.
